@author psirex, dzhon
 @notice Creates EVMScript to top up balances of referral partners

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (bytes memory) pure returns (address[] memory,uint256[] memory)
function (address,bytes4,bytes memory[] memory) pure returns (bytes memory)
function (bytes memory) pure returns (address[] memory,uint256[] memory)

natspec.author: psirex, dzhon

createEVMScript(address,bytes).notice: Creates EVMScript to top up balances of referral partners

params._evmScriptCallData: Encoded tuple: (address[] _referralPartners, uint256[] _amounts) where _referralPartners - addresses of referral partners to top up _amounts - corresponding amount of tokens to transfer

decodeEVMScriptCallData(bytes).notice: Decodes call data used by createEVMScript method

params._evmScriptCallData: Encoded tuple: (address[] _referralPartners, uint256[] _amounts) where _referralPartners - addresses of referral partners to top up _amounts - corresponding amount of tokens to transfer

returns._referralPartners: Addresses of referral partners to top up

natspec.notice: Creates EVMScript to top up balances of referral partners
